dmca.title: Toying with Hot Wheel User?
dmca.body:
Re: Unauthorized And Illegal Use of Mattel's Intellectual Property


Dear [Private]:

I am in-house counsel for Mattel, Inc. (hereinafter "Mattel").  It has come to our attention that you have registered the domain name "hotwheeldsl.com" and are operating a business under the name of HotWheelDSL.  In addition, your business makes use of a logo format which is similar to Mattel's Hot Wheels
